sentences.english: a book about politics
sentences.chinese: 一本有关政治的书

sentences.english: She said something about leaving town.
sentences.chinese: 她说了些要离开镇子的话。

sentences.english: He lied about his age.
sentences.chinese: 他谎报年龄。

sentences.english: About that car of yours. How much are you selling it for?
sentences.chinese: 说到你的那辆车，你打算卖什么价钱？

sentences.english: What’s he on about (=  talking about  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 他在说什么呀？

sentences.english: It’s about Tommy, doctor. He’s been sick again.
sentences.chinese: 医生，是汤米，他又病了。

sentences.english: Jo sensed fear and jealousy all about her.
sentences.chinese: 乔感觉她周围充满恐惧和嫉妒。

detailed_translations.english: concerning or relating to a particular subject

name: above
trans: adj.上面的； adv.在上面；  prep .在...上方

sentences.english: He lived in a flat above the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他住在那商店上面的一套房间里。

sentences.english: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 大型客机在云层上面飞行。

sentences.english: The salaries we offer are well above (= much higher than ) average.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供的薪资远高于平均水平。

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

name: accord
trans: n . &v. 一致 ，符合；<衍生词> according to 根据

sentences.english: The punishments accorded with the current code of discipline.
sentences.chinese: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予
detailed_translations.english: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment

sentences.english: He walked across the field.
sentences.chinese: 他走过田地。

sentences.english: There's a bank right across the street.
sentences.chinese: 街对面就有一家银行。

detailed_translations.english: from one side to the other side of sth

name: act
trans: v. 行动； 扮演 ( … 角 色)

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

sentences.english: The government must take action (=do something) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

detailed_translations.english: the process of doing something, especially in order to achieve a particular thing

name: active
trans: adj. 积极的 (反义形容词) inactive

sentences.english: games for active youngsters
sentences.chinese: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.english: She’s over 80, but is still very active.
sentences.chinese: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

sentences.english: He became politically active at college.
sentences.chinese: 他上大学时开始积极参与政治活动。

detailed_translations.english: always busy doing things, especially physical or mental activities

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

name: actor
trans: n . 男演员；<衍生词> act ress n .女演员

sentences.english: His father was an actor in the Cantonese Opera Company.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲曾是粤剧团的一名演员。

detailed_translations.english: someone who performs in a play or film

sentences.english: I’ve known Barbara for years. Since we were babies, actually.
sentences.chinese: 我认识芭芭拉很多年了，实际上我们从小就认识。

sentences.english: Actually, on second thoughts, I don’t think I want to go out tonight.
sentences.chinese: 其实再想想，我今晚不打算出去了。

detailed_translations.english: used to add new information to what you have just said, to give your opinion, or to start a new conversation
if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

name: advise
trans: vt . 忠告，建议；<衍生词> advisable adj.可取的, 明智的； adviser n .顾问

sentences.english: She needed someone to advise her.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.english: ‘Make sure that you keep the documents in a safe place,’ Otley advised him.
sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

sentences.english: Keep us advised of (= continue to tell us about ) any new developments.
sentences.chinese: 请随时告诉我们任何新的进展情况。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone what you think they should do, especially when you know more than they do about something

name: after
trans: prep . 在… …之后；跟随； conj. 在… …之后； adv. 后来，  以后； adj. 后来的，  以后的

sentences.english: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.english: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.english: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

sentences.english: There’s a meeting on Thursday afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 星期四下午有个会议。

sentences.english: It was very hot in the afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午很热。

sentences.english: See you tomorrow afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 明天下午见。

sentences.english: Are you going into town this afternoon ?
sentences.chinese: 今天下午你进城去吗？

sentences.english: We met in the early afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午较早的时候我们见了面。

sentences.english: By late afternoon , Micky had changed his mind.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，米基已改变了主意。

sentences.english: He was having his afternoon nap .
sentences.chinese: 他在睡午觉。

detailed_translations.english: the part of the day after the morning and before the evening

sentences.english: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

sentences.english: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.english: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.chinese: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.english: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.english: Peter left yesterday evening.
sentences.chinese: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.english: I’ll see you this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.english: It was early evening by the time we got home.
sentences.chinese: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.english: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.english: a broadcast on the evening news
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻广播

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed

sentences.english: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.chinese: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.english: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

detailed_translations.english: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

sentences.english: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.english: sailing against the wind
sentences.chinese: 逆风航行

detailed_translations.english: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

name: ago
trans: adv.  以前； adj. 以前的

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.english: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

name: agree
trans: v. 同意， 赞同；<衍生词>  agreement n . 同意，协议

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

sentences.english: Let’s go outside and get some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去呼吸些新鲜空气吧。

sentences.english: You need to put some air in the tyres.
sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

sentences.english: Flames leapt into the air.
sentences.chinese: 火苗蹿向天空。

sentences.english: He fell 2,000 metres through the air without a parachute.
sentences.chinese: 他没用降落伞在空中下落了2,000米。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of gases around the Earth, that we breathe

sentences.english: The plane landed at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.english: Her family went to see her off at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

detailed_translations.english: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

name: all
trans: adj.全部的； adv. 完全 ；pron .全部

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

name: alone
trans: adj.单独的，  孤独的； adv.独自地

sentences.english: She lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.english: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
without any help from other people

name: along
trans: adv.往前， 向前 ；prep .顺着， 沿着

sentences.english: We were driving along Follyfoot Road.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着福莱福特路行驶。

sentences.english: She glanced anxiously along the line of faces.
sentences.chinese: 她焦急地扫视着这一排面孔。

sentences.english: He slid his hand along her arm.
sentences.chinese: 他的手顺着她的臂膀滑下。

sentences.english: I was driving along, thinking about Chris.
sentences.chinese: 我一边开车，一边想着克里斯。

detailed_translations.english: from one place on something such as a line, road, or edge towards the other end of it
going forward

sentences.english: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’
sentences.chinese: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”

sentences.english: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.chinese: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

detailed_translations.english: before now or before a particular time in the pas

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.english: I’ll always remember that day.
sentences.chinese: 我会永远记住那一天。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

name: America
trans: n .<美>美国 ；American n . 美国人； adj. 美国的

sentences.english: I may go to America or I may not,it all depends.
sentences.chinese: 我也许去美国，也许不去，要视情况而定。

sentences.english: She scampered in London then went back to America.
sentences.chinese: 她在伦敦匆忙地游览了一番，然后回到了美国。

sentences.english: Some of the mountains in America have not yet been mapped out.
sentences.chinese: 美洲有些山脉还没有在地图上标出来。

sentences.english: The girl quickly disappeared among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.english: I could hear voices coming from somewhere among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.english: We walked among the chestnut woods on the mountain slopes.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

sentences.english: She began rummaging among the books on her desk.
sentences.chinese: 她开始在桌子上的一堆书中乱翻起来。

detailed_translations.english: in or through the middle of a group of people or things

sentences.english: an orange
sentences.chinese: 一个橘子

sentences.english: an X-ray
sentences.chinese: 一次X光检查

detailed_translations.english: used when the following word begins with a vowel sound

sentences.english: There is growing anger among the people against the government.
sentences.chinese: 民众对政府越来越不满。

sentences.english: What angered me most was his total lack of remorse.
sentences.chinese: 最让我生气的是他居然毫无悔意。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of wanting to hurt or criticize someone because they have done something bad to you or been unkind to you
to make someone angry

sentences.english: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.english: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.chinese: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.english: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.english: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

detailed_translations.english: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc

sentences.english: furry little animals
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.english: The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.english: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.chinese: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person
human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs

name: another
trans: adj.另外的， 又一 ；  prep .另一个，另一个人

sentences.english: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

detailed_translations.english: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

name: any
trans: adj.任何的，任何一；  pron .无论那一个，任何

sentences.english: Have you got any money?
sentences.chinese: 你身上有没有钱？

sentences.english: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.
sentences.chinese: 凡违反规定的孩子都要受罚。

detailed_translations.english: some or even the smallest amount or number

sentences.english: Anyone could win tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚任何人都可能赢。

sentences.english: They offer help and advice to anyone interested in becoming a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他们为任何有兴趣当老师的人提供帮助和咨询。

sentences.english: If anyone sees Lisa, ask her to call me.
sentences.chinese: 如果有谁看见莉萨，叫她打电话给我。

sentences.english: Anyone else who is interested in going on the trip should see me at the end of this lesson.
sentences.chinese: 还有谁有兴趣参加此次旅行，下课来找我。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to any person, when it is not important to say exactly who

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.english: I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

detailed_translations.english: used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement

sentences.english: apple pie
sentences.chinese: 苹果馅饼

sentences.english: an apple tree
sentences.chinese: 苹果树

sentences.english: roast pork and apple sauce (=  a thick sauce made from cooked apples  )
sentences.chinese: 烤猪肉配苹果酱汁

detailed_translations.english: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside

name: area
trans: n . 范围，  区域， 面积

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

name: around
trans: adv.周围; 大约; prep .在...周围

sentences.english: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.chinese: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.english: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.chinese: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光。

name: as
trans: prep . 当做；  conj. 与...一样； 因为； adv. 如同

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.english: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.english: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。

sentences.english: He pushed his half-eaten salad aside and left.
sentences.chinese: 他推开吃了一半的色拉走了。

sentences.english: He stepped aside to let Katherine go in first.
sentences.chinese: 他站到一边让凯瑟琳先进去。

sentences.english: Mark drew me aside and explained the problem.
sentences.chinese: 马克把我拉到一边给我解释这个问题。

sentences.english: She swept her thick hair aside.
sentences.chinese: 她把浓密的头发梳到一边。

detailed_translations.english: moved to one side or away from you

sentences.english: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.chinese: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.english: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.chinese: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.english: They make a huge migration from the north to the south of the US, mostly starting in August and the other way around in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

detailed_translations.english: the eighth month of the year, between July and September

sentences.english: He transplanted his family to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他把家迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.english: He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

name: away
trans: adv.在远处， 到远处， 离去

sentences.english: Go away!
sentences.chinese: 走开！

sentences.english: Dinah was crying as she drove slowly away.
sentences.chinese: 黛娜一边哭一边慢慢地开车走了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone leaves a place or person, or stays some distance from a place or person

name: back
trans: adj.后面的； adv. 向后地； n .背部；v.后退

sentences.english: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我马上回来。

sentences.english: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.chinese: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.english: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.chinese: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.english: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.chinese: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.english: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.chinese: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

detailed_translations.english: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

name: bad
trans: adj.劣质的，有害的，坏的；<衍生词> 比较级 worse, 最高级 worst

sentences.english: I have some bad news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有坏消息要告诉你。

sentences.english: I thought things couldn’t possibly get any worse.
sentences.chinese: 我想事情最坏也不过如此了。

sentences.english: The plane was delayed for several hours by bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气不好，飞机延误了好几个小时。

sentences.english: It’s difficult to break bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 坏习惯很难改。

sentences.english: a bad smell
sentences.chinese: 难闻的气味

detailed_translations.english: unpleasant or likely to cause problems

sentences.english: The company has been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司的管理非常差。

sentences.english: He’s been limping badly ever since the skiing accident.
sentences.chinese: 出了那次滑雪事故以后，他的腿跛得很厉害。

sentences.english: We badly wanted to help, but there was nothing we could do.
sentences.chinese: 我们很想帮忙，可又无计可施。

sentences.english: He was beaten so badly that his brother didn’t recognize him.
sentences.chinese: 他被打得连他哥哥都认不出他了。

sentences.english: The school is badly in need of (=  very much needs  ) some new computers.
sentences.chinese: 学校急需一些新电脑。

sentences.english: Things started to go badly wrong (=  go wrong in a serious way  ) for Eric after he lost his job.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克失去工作以后，一切都很不如意。

detailed_translations.english: in an unsatisfactory or unsuccessful way

sentences.english: ...a bag of sweets.
sentences.chinese: …一袋糖果。

detailed_translations.english: the amount that a bag will hold

detailed_translations.chinese: 猎获；把…装入袋中；占据，私吞；使膨大
detailed_translations.english: to put things into bags

sentences.english: a tennis/golf/cricket etc ball
sentences.chinese: 网球/高尔夫球/板球等

sentences.english: Shape the dough into balls
sentences.chinese: 把面团搓成丸子。

sentences.english: The air of the ball began to hum.
sentences.chinese: 舞会的气氛开始活跃起来了。

detailed_translations.english: a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport

sentences.english: The area is under banana cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区种植香蕉。

sentences.english: The banana bears two crops every year.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉一年收两喷。

sentences.english: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

detailed_translations.english: a long curved tropical fruit with a yellow skin

sentences.english: Did you bank that check?
sentences.chinese: 你把那张支票存入银行了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to put or keep money in a bank

name: ase
trans: n .底部，基础，根据地；vt . 以...作基础，基于...

sentences.english: a shopping basket
sentences.chinese: 购物篮

sentences.english: a basket full of vegetables
sentences.chinese: 装满蔬菜的篮子

detailed_translations.chinese: 篮子；（篮球比赛的）得分；一篮之量；篮筐
detailed_translations.english: a container made of thin pieces of plastic, wire, or wood woven together, used to carry things or put things in

sentences.english: We didn’t enjoy the day because the weather was so awful.
sentences.chinese: 那天我们很不尽兴，因为天气实在太糟。

sentences.english: ‘Why can’t I go?’ ‘Because you’re not old enough.’
sentences.chinese: “我为什么不能去？”“因为你年纪太小。”

sentences.english: Hubert never experienced any fear, and this was partly because he was not particularly intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 休伯特从来都没有害怕的感觉，部分原因是他这人不大聪明。

sentences.english: Many exam candidates lose marks simply because they do not read the questions properly.
sentences.chinese: 许多应试者失分只是因为没有好好地读题。

sentences.english: I decided to go with them, mainly because I had nothing better to do.
sentences.chinese: 我决定和他们一起去，主要是因为我没有更好的事情可做。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are giving the reason for something

name: bed
trans: n .床；<衍生词> bed room n . 卧室

sentences.english: You should go to bed early.
sentences.chinese: 你应该早点上床。

sentences.english: She got into bed and turned out the light.
sentences.chinese: 她上了床，关掉灯。

sentences.english: rose beds
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花坛

sentences.english: the sea bed
sentences.chinese: 海底

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture that you sleep on

name: belong
trans: vi.属于；<衍生物> be longings n . [经] 财产，所有物

sentences.english: The house had belonged to her family for three or four generations.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子属于她家已有三四代了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 属于，应归入；居住；适宜；应被放置
detailed_translations.english: If something belongs to you, you own it

sentences.english: an animal that lives below ground
sentences.chinese: 生活在地下的动物

sentences.english: Water was dripping onto the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 水滴到下面的地板上。

sentences.english: I could hear voices in the courtyard below my window.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到院子里有人在我的窗下说话。

sentences.english: They camped a few hundred feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 他们在山峰下面几百英尺的地方扎了营。

sentences.english: Down below, people were talking and laughing.
sentences.chinese: 下面，人们谈笑风生。

sentences.english: Somewhere far below, a door slammed.
sentences.chinese: 下面远远的什么地方有一扇门砰地关上了。

sentences.english: The kitchen is directly below her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 厨房就在她卧室的正下方。

sentences.english: Captain Parker went below (=  to the lower level of the ship  ) , leaving Clooney in charge.
sentences.chinese: 帕克船长下去了，让克卢尼掌舵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面
detailed_translations.english: in a lower place or position, or on a lower level

sentences.english: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.chinese: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

sentences.english: the table beside the bed
sentences.chinese: 床边的桌子

sentences.english: I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to or very close to the side of someone or something

sentences.english: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.chinese: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.english: The area has stunning scenery, beautiful beaches, and much more besides.
sentences.chinese: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

detailed_translations.english: used when adding another reason

name: beyond
trans: prep .在 ...较远的一边，超过；adv.在远处

sentences.english: They crossed the mountains and headed for the valleys beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻过山，向更远处的山谷进发。

sentences.english: Beyond the river, cattle were grazing.
sentences.chinese: 河的那边，牛在吃草。

sentences.english: She drove through Westport, and stopped a few miles beyond at a wayside inn.
sentences.chinese: 她驱车穿过西港，在几英里外的一个路边旅馆停了下来。

detailed_translations.english: on or to the further side of something

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

sentences.english: Let’s go for a bike ride.
sentences.chinese: 我们去骑会儿自行车吧。

sentences.english: She bikes to work every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天骑自行车上班。

detailed_translations.english: a bicycle
to ride a bicycle

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

name: black
trans: adj. 黑色的； n . 黑色

sentences.english: a black evening dress
sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.english: It was still pitch black (= very dark ) out.
sentences.chinese: 外面依然一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: having the darkest colour, like coal or night

sentences.english: Her body was found in a pool of blood.
sentences.chinese: 她的尸体被发现倒在血泊之中。

sentences.english: Blood oozed from a cut on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 血从他额头的伤口里渗了出来。

sentences.english: There’s Irish blood on his mother’s side.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲有爱尔兰血统。

detailed_translations.english: the red liquid that your heart pumps around your body

name: blue
trans: n .蓝色； adj.蓝色的，忧郁的

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.english: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

sentences.english: Can I borrow your pen for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

sentences.english: They borrowed heavily (=  borrowed a lot of money  ) from the bank to start their new business.
sentences.chinese: 他们向银行贷了巨款来创办新公司。

detailed_translations.english: to use something that belongs to someone else and that you must give back to them later

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 一个空瓶子

detailed_translations.english: a container with a narrow top for keeping liquids in, usually made of plastic or glass
to put a liquid, especially wine or beer, into a bottle after you have made it

name: box
trans: n .盒子， 箱 ；v.装...入盒中，拳击

sentences.english: the jury box
sentences.chinese: 陪审团席

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

sentences.english: The boys wanted to play football.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子们想踢足球。

sentences.english: boys and girls aged 11–18
sentences.chinese: 11到18岁之间的男孩和女孩

sentences.english: What a polite little boy (=  young male child  ) you are.
sentences.chinese: 你真是个有礼貌的小男孩。

sentences.english: Come on, Timmy, act like a big boy (=  an older boy  ) now.
sentences.chinese: 行了，蒂米，要有大男孩的样子了。

sentences.english: Good boy!
sentences.chinese: 好伙计！

detailed_translations.english: a male child, or a male person in general

name: Brazil
trans: n . 巴西；<衍生词> Brazilian  n . 巴西人； adj. 巴西的

sentences.english: Brazil has a big surplus of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 巴西有很多剩余咖啡。

sentences.english: Today's football match is France versus Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 今天的足球赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.english: Brazil has thrown up many world-famous footballers.
sentences.chinese: 巴西出了许多闻名世界的足球运动员。

sentences.english: Would you like some bread with your soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喝汤时要吃点面包吗？

sentences.english: a loaf of brown bread
sentences.chinese: 一条黑面包

sentences.english: a piece of bread and butter
sentences.chinese: 一块黄油面包

detailed_translations.english: a type of food made from flour and water that is mixed together and then baked

name: breath
trans: n .呼吸，  气息；<衍生词> b reathe v.呼吸， 发出

sentences.english: Slow down, I need to catch my breath.
sentences.chinese: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

detailed_translations.english: the air that you take into your lungs and send out again

sentences.english: He walked back over the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.english: They recreate themselves with playing bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们以打桥牌作消遣。

detailed_translations.english: a structure built over a river, road etc that allows people or vehicles to cross from one side to the other

sentences.english: Her eyes were hurting from the bright lights.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的光线刺痛了她的眼睛。

sentences.english: bright sunshine
sentences.chinese: 灿烂的阳光

sentences.english: a large bright room
sentences.chinese: 明亮的大房间

sentences.english: He was an exceptionally bright child.
sentences.chinese: 他是个特别聪明的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: shining strongly, or with plenty of light

name: Britain
trans: n . 英国；<衍生词>British  adj. 英国的， 英国人的

sentences.english: This is the stud  naturalized from Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这是从不列颠引进的种马。

detailed_translations.english: the island containing England, Scotland and Wales, Great Britain

name: brother
trans: n .兄弟；<衍生词> brotherly adj.兄弟的， 亲兄弟般的

sentences.english: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.chinese: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.english: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥一直照顾我。

sentences.english: my twin brother
sentences.chinese: 我的双胞胎兄弟

sentences.english: We must work together, brothers!
sentences.chinese: 我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

detailed_translations.english: a male who has the same parents as you

name: brown
trans: n .褐色； adj.褐色的，棕色的

sentences.english: This particular model is available in brown, white, or grey.
sentences.chinese: 这个型号的产品有棕色、白色和灰色的。

sentences.english: the browns and greens of the landscape
sentences.chinese: 棕绿相映的风景

detailed_translations.english: the colour of earth, wood, or coffee

sentences.english: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.chinese: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.english: a busy mother of four
sentences.chinese: 一个忙忙碌碌、育有四个孩子的妈妈

sentences.english: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.chinese: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.english: December is the busiest time of year for shops.
sentences.chinese: 十二月份是一年中商店最繁忙的时期。

detailed_translations.english: if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do

name: but
trans: prep .除... 以外； conj. 但是

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
sentences.chinese: 她站在窗边。

sentences.english: I was attacked by a dog.
sentences.chinese: 我被一条狗袭击。

sentences.english: a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

sentences.english: ...fruits and vegetables that will be canned, skinned, diced, or otherwise processed.
sentences.chinese: …将要经过装罐、去皮、切块或其他加工程序的水果和蔬菜。

detailed_translations.english: When food or drink is canned, it is put into a metal container and sealed so that it will remain fresh.

sentences.english: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多癌症可以治愈。

sentences.english: She was told last year that she had cancer .
sentences.chinese: 去年她得知自己患了癌症。

sentences.english: He died of cancer last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月他死于癌症。

sentences.english: a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 一种能有效杀死癌细胞的新疗法

detailed_translations.english: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal

sentences.english: Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
sentences.chinese: 丹下了车，锁上车门。

sentences.english: He isn’t old enough to drive a car.

sentences.chinese: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。

sentences.chinese: 他们结队在埃及坐大篷车旅行。

name: either
trans: adj.任一的 ；  pron .任一， 随便任一个；  conj.或者，也

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.

trans: adj. 别的，其他的； adv.另外，其他

sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.chinese: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something
You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing

sentences.english: It’s usually best to contact him by email.
sentences.chinese: 一般最好是用电子邮件和他联络。

detailed_translations.english: a division of the United Kingdom

trans: adj.足够的， 充足的； n .充足，足够； adv.足够地， 充分地； int .够了!

to the necessary degree

sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

detailed_translations.english: ordinary, usual, or happening every day

detailed_translations.english: each thing or all things

sentences.chinese: 我到处都找过了，但就是找不到地图。

sentences.chinese: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

trans: vt .原谅，饶恕；<衍生词> forgiveness n . 宽恕， 宽仁之心

sentences.chinese: 她已婚，有四个孩子。

sentences.chinese: 刚过四点钟，他们就到了。

trans: n . 法国； French n . 法国人， 法语； adj. 法国的， 法国人的， 法语的

sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Friday and Sunday

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

sentences.english: I'm from Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我是意大利人。

trans: n . 花园；<衍生词> gardener n . 园丁

sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.chinese: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

trans: n .普通，将军， 常规； adj.一般的，普通的，综合的，全面的；generally adv.通常，一般地

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.chinese: 四星上将

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things

sentences.chinese: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.english: Bismarck ruled Germany by a strong hand.
sentences.chinese: 俾斯麦用铁腕手段统治德国。

detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it

sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

sentences.english: good quality cloth

sentences.chinese: 男孩向他的奶奶挥手再见。

sentences.english: If it ends great, it means both of you want more. If it ends otherwise, the next thing to do is to wave goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 如果结束得好，那么它意味着你们两个都想接触的时间更长；否则，接下来要做的事情就是挥手再见。

sentences.english: Grandma was from Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶来自苏格兰。

detailed_translations.english: grandmother

sentences.english: My grandparents live in Sussex.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母住在萨塞克斯郡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母
detailed_translations.english: one of the parents of your mother or father

name: green
trans: n .绿色，绿色颜料； adj.绿色的

sentences.english: beautiful green eyes
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的碧眼

sentences.english: Raw coffee beans are green in colour.
sentences.chinese: 生咖啡豆是绿色的。

sentences.english: a room decorated in pale blues and greens
sentences.chinese: 用浅蓝色和浅绿色装修的房间

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of grass or leaves
the colour of grass and leaves

sentences.english: Belinda greeted her warmly.
sentences.chinese: 贝琳达热情地招呼她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

name: grey
trans: adj.灰色的，灰白的； n .灰色

sentences.english: an old lady with grey hair
sentences.chinese: 头发灰白的老太太

sentences.english: a grey sky
sentences.chinese: 灰色的天空

sentences.english: Do you have these skirts in grey?
sentences.chinese: 这些裙子有灰色的吗？

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of dark clouds, neither black nor white
the colour of dark clouds, neither black nor white

name: half
trans: n .一半；adj.一半的，半途的； adv.一半地

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
sentences.chinese: “保罗在哪儿？”“他去看电影了。”

sentences.english: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: head
trans: n . 头，领袖；vt .作为... 的首领，朝向，前进； adj. 头的，主要的

sentences.english: He kissed the top of her head.
sentences.chinese: 他吻了一下她的头顶。

sentences.english: Alan fell asleep as soon as he put his head on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦头一挨枕头就睡着了。

sentences.english: They dived head first into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们一头跳进水中。

sentences.english: She was dressed in black from head to foot (= over all her body ).
sentences.chinese: 她从头到脚穿了一身黑。

sentences.english: He still has a full head of hair (= has all his hair, even though he is getting rather old ).
sentences.chinese: 他依然满头浓发。

sentences.english: Jenny marched proudly at the head of the procession.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮自豪地走在游行队伍的前列。

sentences.english: David was asked to head up the technical team.
sentences.chinese: 戴维被要求领导技术小组。

detailed_translations.english: the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck
to be in charge of a team, government, organization etc

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

sentences.english: Hello, John! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 喂，约翰！你好吗？

sentences.english: Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.english: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好！好久不见了。

detailed_translations.english: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.english: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place ’

sentences.english: She hurt herself.
sentences.chinese: 她弄伤了自己。

sentences.english: She must be very proud of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她一定非常自豪。

detailed_translations.english: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

name: hot
trans: adj. 热的，辣的； adv. 热

sentences.english: a hot day in July
sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: a four-bedroom house
sentences.chinese: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.english: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.chinese: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.english: a small independent software house
sentences.chinese: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.english: an auction house
sentences.chinese: 一家拍卖行

sentences.english: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.chinese: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

name: how
trans: adv. 如何； 多少； conj. 如何

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

name: idea
trans: n . 想法，主意， 思想，概念

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.english: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened

name: in
trans: prep . 在… … 内；进… … 里

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: Burma borders on India.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.english: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.chinese: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.english: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

sentences.english: Come into the office.
sentences.chinese: 到办公室里来。

sentences.english: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.english: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.english: Sue got back into bed and pulled the quilt over her head.
sentences.chinese: 休回到床上，拉过被子蒙住头。

sentences.english: I’ve got to go into town this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我今天上午得进城去。

sentences.english: We dived into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们跳进海里。

detailed_translations.english: to the inside or inner part of a container, place, area etc

name: island
trans: n . 岛， 岛屿 ；vt .使成岛状

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: He emphasized its importance to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我强调它的重要性。

sentences.english: The child read the story but did not comprehend its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子读了这篇故事，但不能理解它的意思。

sentences.english: The company disseminated information about its new programmes.
sentences.chinese: 公司传播有关其新计划的信息。

name: itself
trans: pron . 它本身， 它自己

sentences.english: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
sentences.chinese: 猫躺在沙发上把自己舔干。

sentences.english: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
sentences.chinese: 工作程序结束，机器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
sentences.chinese: 已发展为业绩喜人的公司的一家小型地方企业

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action

sentences.english: a carton of orange juice
sentences.chinese: 一纸盒橙汁

sentences.english: A Coke and a tomato juice, please.
sentences.chinese: 请来一杯可乐和一杯番茄汁。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables, or a drink that is made from this

sentences.english: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.chinese: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.english: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.english: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.chinese: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

sentences.english: Maggie leaned forward and kissed her cheek.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉俯身吻了她的脸颊。

sentences.english: Georgina took him in her arms and kissed him on the lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔治娜抱住他，吻他的嘴唇。

sentences.english: Jim and Mary kissed (= they kissed each other ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和玛丽接了吻。

detailed_translations.english: to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
an act of kissing

name: lady
trans: n .女士， 夫人， 小姐

sentences.english: Lady Spencer
sentences.chinese: 斯宾塞夫人

sentences.english: the lords and ladies of the court
sentences.chinese: 宫廷的贵族及夫人

detailed_translations.english: used as the title of the wife or daughter of a British noblemanor the wife of a knight

name: laugh
trans: vi. 笑，讥笑； n .笑， 笑声

sentences.english: Maria looked at him and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚看着他大笑起来。

sentences.english: Tony was laughing so hard he had to steady himself on the table.
sentences.chinese: 托尼笑得太厉害了，靠着桌子才能让自己站稳。

sentences.english: Nora laughed so much that she nearly cried.
sentences.chinese: 诺拉笑得眼泪都快出来了。

sentences.english: He couldn’t help it; he burst out laughing (= suddenly started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他情不自禁地放声大笑起来。

sentences.english: He’s one of the few writers who can make me laugh out loud.
sentences.chinese: 有几位作家能让我放声大笑，他是其中之一。

sentences.english: He gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了一声。

detailed_translations.english: to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
the act of laughing or the sound you make when you laugh

name: law
trans: n . 法律，规律， 守则， 准则

sentences.english: Elected officials ought to obey the law.
sentences.chinese: 民选官员理应遵守法律。

sentences.english: laws passed by Parliament
sentences.chinese: 议会通过的法律

detailed_translations.english: the whole system of rules that people in a particular country or area must obey

name: lead
trans: vt .领导，  引导，致使；vi.领导，通向，导致 ；n .领导，领先

sentences.english: drinking water supplied by old-fashioned lead pipes
sentences.chinese: 由老式铅管输送的饮用水

detailed_translations.english: a chemical element. Lead is a heavy soft grey metal, used especially in the past for water pipes or to cover roofs.

sentences.english: The landlord refused to renew his lease.
sentences.chinese: 房东拒绝和他续签租约。

sentences.english: The 99-year lease expired in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 99年期的租约于1999年到期。

sentences.english: Do you understand all the terms of the lease?
sentences.chinese: 租约条款你都理解吗？

detailed_translations.english: a legal agreement which allows you to use a building, car etc for a period of time, in return for rent

detailed_translations.chinese: 出租； 租得， 租有
detailed_translations.english: to use a building, car etc under a lease

name: least
trans: adj. 最小的， 最少的； adv. 最少， 最小

sentences.english: He's the best teacher, even though he has the least experience.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
less than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: I can’t come out tonight – my dad won’t let me.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我不能出来，我爸爸不允许。

detailed_translations.english: to allow someone to do something

sentences.english: What’s for lunch?
sentences.chinese: 午饭吃什么？

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the middle of the day

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

sentences.english: You shouldn’t read other people’s mail.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该看别人的信件。

sentences.english: He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
sentences.chinese: 他发现有堆积如山的邮件等着他处理。

sentences.english: She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ) .
sentences.chinese: 她答应把我的邮件转寄到我的新地址。

sentences.english: He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ) .
sentences.chinese: 他收到成堆仰慕者的来信。

sentences.english: The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 每周一期的简报邮寄给全国各地的妇女。

detailed_translations.english: the letters and packages that are delivered to you
to send a letter or package to someone

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.english: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys
a man

name: man
trans: n . 男人；<衍生词> woman n .女人

sentences.english: There were two men and a woman in the car.
sentences.chinese: 车上有两男一女。

sentences.english: He’s a very kind man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常和蔼的人。

sentences.english: a man’s watch
sentences.chinese: 男式手表

sentences.english: All men are equal in the eyes of the law.
sentences.chinese: 法律面前人人平等。

sentences.english: This is one of the worst diseases known to man.
sentences.chinese: 这是人类已知最严重的疾病之一。

detailed_translations.english: an adult male human

name: market
trans: n .市场，销路 ；vt .在市场上交易，使上市，vi.在市场上买卖

sentences.english: I usually buy all my vegetables at the market.
sentences.chinese: 我通常都是在菜市场里购买蔬菜。

sentences.english: Our main overseas market is Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要海外市场是日本。

detailed_translations.english: a time when people buy and sell goods, food etc, or the place, usually outside or in a large building, where this happens

name: matter
trans: n .事件， 问题，物质，  内容 ；vi.有关系，要紧

sentences.english: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.english: Does it matter what I think?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.english: Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.english: campaigning on issues that really matter
sentences.chinese: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.english: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.english: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.english: At last she was with the man she loved and nothing else mattered .
sentences.chinese: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.english: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.chinese: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.english: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.english: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

name: maybe
trans: adv. 大概，或许； n .疑虑

sentences.english: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.english: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.english: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.chinese: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.english: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.chinese: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.english: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain

sentences.english: Stop, you’re hurting me.
sentences.chinese: 住手，你弄疼我了。

sentences.english: He bought me a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他给我买了一杯酒。

sentences.english: Give that book to me.
sentences.chinese: 把那本书给我。

sentences.english: She’s two years older than me.
sentences.chinese: 她比我大两岁。

sentences.english: That’s me, standing on the left.
sentences.chinese: 那是我，站在左边的那一个。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

sentences.english: We’re having a meeting next week to discuss the matter.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周将开会讨论此事。

sentences.english: I had felt drawn to Alice ever since our first meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次见到艾丽斯就感觉被她吸引住了

detailed_translations.english: an event at which people meet to discuss and decide things

name: mental
trans: adj.精神的，智力的；<衍生词> mentally adv.精神上，智力上

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind

name: middle
trans: n . 中间，  当中； adj. 中间的，  中部的

sentences.english: We rowed out towards the middle of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们朝湖中央划去。

sentences.english: They spent the middle part of their vacation in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：假期的中间一段他们是在佛罗里达州度过的。

detailed_translations.english: the part that is nearest the centre of something, and furthest from the sides, edges, top, bottom etc
half of the way through an event or period of time

sentences.english: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

name: might
trans: aux. 可能，也许， 可以 ( may 的过去式)

sentences.english: If you need more information, you might try the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要更多的信息，可以试试因特网。

sentences.english: I thought we might go to the new Chinese restaurant on the High Street.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以到大街上新开的那家中国餐馆去。

sentences.english: It might be a good idea to put those plants in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 把那些植物放在阴凉处也许是个好主意。

sentences.english: We’re going to a concert. You might like to come with us.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听音乐会，你也许想和我们一起去吧。

detailed_translations.english: if something might happen or might be true, there is a possibility that it may happen or may be true, but you are not at all certain

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
sentences.chinese: 一瓶奶

sentences.english: Would you like some milk in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你茶里要加点奶吗？

sentences.english: a pint of semi-skimmed milk
sentences.chinese: 一品脱半脱脂奶

sentences.english: I helped to milk the cows.
sentences.chinese: 我帮忙挤牛奶。

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

sentences.english: The book sold more than a million copies.
sentences.chinese: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.english: I’ve got a million ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我主意多得很。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000
an extremely large number of people or things

sentences.english: Mom, can I go over to Lisa’s house?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，我能到莉萨家去吗？

sentences.english: My mom says I have to stay home tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我妈说我今晚得待在家里。

detailed_translations.english: mother

sentences.english: Be very good and very quiet and help your mommy.
sentences.chinese: 你要乖乖的，安静些，要帮妈咪。

detailed_translations.english: mother – used by or to young children

name: more
trans: adj.更多的； n .更多； adv.更

sentences.english: I have no more questions.
sentences.chinese: 我没问题了。

sentences.english: The film deserves more attention from the public.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片应受到公众的更多注意。

sentences.english: The accident taught him to be more careful.
sentences.chinese: 这起事故的教训使他变得更小心。

detailed_translations.english: a greater amount or number
having a particular quality to a greater degree

sentences.english: His mother and father are both doctors.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母都是医生。

sentences.english: the relationship between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的关系

sentences.english: Goodnight, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 晚安，妈妈。

sentences.english: Mother said they’d met at university.
sentences.chinese: 母亲说他们是在大学里认识的。

sentences.english: If food is scarce, the mother will feed the smaller, weaker chicks.
sentences.chinese: 如果食物稀少，母禽就喂较小、较弱的幼禽。

detailed_translations.english: a female parent of a child or animal

name: much
trans: adv. 非常，很； adj. 大量的； n . 许多， 大量； pron . 许多， 大量

sentences.english: The day ended much as it began.
sentences.chinese: 这一天结束时还像开始时一样。

sentences.english: I don’t have much money with me.
sentences.chinese: 我身上没带很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: by a great amount
a large amount of something

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

sentences.english: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.english: I can look after myself.
sentences.chinese: 我可以照顾好自己。

sentences.english: I’m making myself a sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 我在给自己做三明治。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action

name: name
trans: n .名字，名称；vt .命名， 叫出

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
sentences.chinese: 你叫什么名字？

sentences.english: He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.english: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

detailed_translations.english: what someone is called
to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially

sentences.english: a late evening news broadcast
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻节目

sentences.english: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

detailed_translations.english: reports of recent events in the newspapers or on the radio or television

sentences.english: He’s only been in this job for nine months.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.english: We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我们9点开始营业。

sentences.english: Kay was taught by her mother till she was nine (= nine years old ).
sentences.chinese: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 9

name: no
trans: adj. 没有； 不是； adv. 不， 完全不； n . 否定的回答

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.chinese: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.english: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

name: none
trans: adv. 决不， 毫不；  pron .一个也没有， 毫无

sentences.english: I wish I could offer you some cake but there’s none left.
sentences.chinese: 我真想能请你吃些蛋糕，但一点也没剩的了。

sentences.english: Although these were good students, none had a score above 60.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这些都是好学生，但是没有一个考到60分以上。

sentences.english: She waited for a reply, but none came.
sentences.chinese: 她等着答复，可是什么也没等到。

sentences.english: Even an old car is better than none.
sentences.chinese: 有一辆旧车也比没有车强。

sentences.english: I was none too pleased to have to take the exam again.
sentences.chinese: 我要重考一次，根本高兴不起来。

detailed_translations.english: not any amount of something or not one of a group of people or things
not at all

name: north
trans: n . 北， 北方； adj. 北方的； adv.在北方， 向北方

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

sentences.english: Someone punched him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 有人一拳打在他的鼻子上。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person’s or animal’s face used for smelling or breathing

name: notice
trans: n .通知， 注意；v. 注意到

sentences.english: He noticed a woman in a black dress sitting across from him.
sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: I didn’t notice any smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

sentences.english: I waved but they took no notice.
sentences.chinese: 我挥了挥手，可是他们没有注意到。

sentences.english: Firefighters were prepared to rush out at a moment’s notice.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员准备着随时出动。

detailed_translations.english: if you notice something or someone, you realize that they exist, especially because you can see, hear, or feel them
when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

sentences.english: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.chinese: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.english: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: now, compared with what happened in the past

name: nowhere
trans: adv. 无处， 到处都无

sentences.english: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么地方的吸毒问题比美国更严重。

detailed_translations.english: not in any place or to any place

name: off
trans: adj. 远的， 空闲的； adv. 离开 ，分离 ；  prep . 从... 离开，脱离

sentences.english: He got into his car and drove off.
sentences.chinese: 他上了车，随即开车走了。

sentences.english: Will someone switch the radio off?
sentences.chinese: 谁把收音机关掉好吗？

detailed_translations.english: away from a place

name: office
trans: n . 办公室， 办事处

sentences.english: The department occupies an office just a mile from the White House.
sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.english: Did you go to the office (= the office where you work ) today?
sentences.chinese: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.english: the increased demand for office space
sentences.chinese: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

sentences.english: the Foreign Office
sentences.chinese: 外交部

detailed_translations.english: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks

sentences.english: She often works at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她周末经常要上班。

sentences.english: If you wash your hair too often, it can get too dry.
sentences.chinese: 如果洗头过勤，头发会变得干枯。

sentences.english: How often do you see your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你隔多久去看你父母？

sentences.english: Robin is a difficult child; you’ve said so yourself often enough (= a lot of times ).
sentences.chinese: 罗宾是个难管的孩子，你自己也常常这么说。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens often, it happens regularly or many times

name: once
trans: n .&adv.一次，从前， 曾经；  conj.一旦

sentences.english: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.chinese: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.english: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.chinese: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

detailed_translations.english: on one occasion only
from the time when something happens

name: only
trans: adv. 只，仅仅； adj. 唯一的，仅有的

sentences.english: Naomi was only 17 when she got married.
sentences.chinese: 娜奥米结婚时才17岁。

sentences.english: There are only a few cars on the island.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛上只有几辆汽车。

sentences.english: It’s only eight o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 才8点钟。

sentences.english: I was the only woman there.
sentences.chinese: 我是那里唯一的女性。

detailed_translations.english: not more than a particular number, age etc
used to say that there is one person, thing, or group in a particular situation and no others

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: orange juice
sentences.chinese: 橙汁

sentences.english: orange peel
sentences.chinese: 橙子皮

sentences.english: Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )
sentences.chinese: 柑橘园

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

sentences.english: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.chinese: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

name: otherwise
trans: adv.另外，否则； adj.另外的，其他方面的

sentences.english: He was tired but otherwise in good health.
sentences.chinese: 他除了累身体很好。

sentences.english: I could hear the distant noise of traffic. Otherwise all was still.
sentences.chinese: 我能听见远处车流的声音，除此之外，一切都很安静。
